attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to intervene and requests that Home Office Border Agency to process Long Residence Applications  made quickly and to provide the cases information as regards stages of application. To actually hit the set targets of make decisions between 4-14 weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have lived and worked in UK as law abiding for more than 16 years as a result made Long Residence Application to Home Office paid for the service and still waiting for them to make a decision. We have had bad and terrible  experiences of calling Home Office information centres concerning our applications made for more than 5 years. We do not get information from them as regards the application. Home office continued to delay making final decision suggests that we have been forgotten. The continue delay is making life unbearable for us, we have lost our jobs because our families have no status to present to our employers. We have pay for this service and at the same time made to wait for years for a decision.  We have live and adapted UK lifestyle as our home for so many years, to legalise our stay will provide opportunity to look for jobs to feed our families, benefits UK economy, people and the community.
